name: Ennmario
description:
The Mario Brothers Went Broke!
After The Events Of Super Mario Bros. Mario And Luigi Were Having A Great Time!
Until It All Started.....  The Mario Brothers Has Lost Their Jobs!

Controls -  Arrow Keys - T to Talk

This Game Is Based On The Pico 8 Game Called "Ennluigi"
https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/806363526/

Sprites From MFGG
